mapper.select: select a.announcement_id announcementId, a.announcement_title announcementTitle, a.announcement_state announcementState, a.create_time createTime, a.create_user_id createUserId, u.USERNAME createUserName, a.announcement_content announcementContent from t_announcement a left join T_USER u on a.create_user_id = u.USER_ID where a.announcement_id = #{announcementId}

select * from ( select a.announcement_id announcementId, a.announcement_title announcementTitle, a.create_time createTime, a.create_user_id createUserId, u.USERNAME createUserName, a.announcement_content announcementContent from t_announcement a left join T_USER u on a.create_user_id = u.USER_ID where a.announcement_state = '1' order by a.create_time desc) where ROWNUM <= 8
